column4: hi everyone. I just installed Ubuntu for the first time, and need some help

after the install, two out of three times, the bios doesn't get past the RAM check. I never had this problem before. It does not happen when I disconnect the HD. I tried installing on a different HD, but still the same problem.
the BIOS comes before Ubuntu is loaded, so it is not an Ubuntu isuue, it sounds like a hardware issue
